imdb.title: Shin Sekai Yori
imdb.plot: In a post-apocalyptic world set a thousand years after our era, the remaining humans, now with telekinesis, live in a seemingly peaceful society, but dark secrets of the past will soon be discovered by a small group of friends.

episodes.title: The Season of New Leaves
episodes.plot: In the year 2011, humans begin manifesting psychokinetic powers, causing untold destruction and countless deaths. 1000 years later, Saki's own powers begin to flourish.

episodes.title: The Vanishing Children
episodes.plot: Saki and her friends in Group 1 take part in a game tournament using their powers to move around clay dolls. Shortly after, tragedy strikes one of the opposing teams.

episodes.title: The False Minoshiro
episodes.plot: The members of Group 1 set out for summer camp. While telling scary stories, the children recount the tale of the "False Minoshiro", a legendary and deadly creature.

episodes.title: Escape
episodes.plot: With little chance to escape, Saki discovers a way to gain their powers back, but it comes at a great cost to Satoru.

episodes.title: Summer Darkness
episodes.plot: Satoru's power is waning, as their latest threat is much larger than expected. When all seems lost, help comes from an ally that could be much more dangerous.

episodes.title: Omen
episodes.plot: Two years pass, and the children enter adolescence. As they begin pairing off, Saki's experiences unrequited feelings for a certain other group member.

episodes.title: The Rising Wind
episodes.plot: When Shun stops coming to school, his friends in Group 1 begin searching for him, but run into obstacles at every turn. Saki and Satoru set out for Shun's village.

episodes.title: More Than Darkness

episodes.title: Distant Thunder in Winter
episodes.plot: After turning down a fellow student's request, Saki pairs up with Satoru for required training. Later, Saki discovers something sinister having to do with their memories.

episodes.title: The Weak Link

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: Saki and the other's set out to find Mamoru after he runs away from home. While on their search, they discover the Board of Education's true intentions.

episodes.title: Snowflakes

episodes.title: Afterimage
episodes.plot: After a freak accident leaves Saki unconscious, she and Satoru awaken in the Robber Fly village, who have advanced wildly since their last meeting.

episodes.title: To my Beloved Saki
episodes.plot: Maria leaves Saki a letter with her and Mamoru's plans, but she and Satoru continue their search for them anyway. Later, Saki experiences troubling nightmares.

episodes.title: Footsteps of Destruction

episodes.title: Scarlet Flower
episodes.plot: An investigation is underway over the demise of the Giant Hornets. One council member suspects that Maria and Mamoru are behind the attack.

episodes.title: Darkness
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the Monster Rats' sneak attack, Saki and Satoru join up with another group and accompany them to the hospital to check on one of their injured friends. As they arrive, they find the hospital destroyed. After clearing the place of the Monster Rats and rescuing the few survivors, the party is attacked by an unknown individual who kills everyone in its path with an overwhelming power. Fearing that the enemy in question may be an Ogre, the other members of the party decide to sacrifice themselves to let Saki and Satoru to escape and warn the others; ...

episodes.title: Cold Sunlight
episodes.plot: Someone or something is following Saki and Satoru as they glide down the river discussing what has happened.

episodes.title: The Fire that Destroys the World
episodes.plot: Saki and Niimi, her coworker, decide to head to the Temple of Purity, as Kaburagi declares war on the Monster Rats, promising to eliminate them from Japan. But the Ogre approaches, killing many humans as it comes to confront Kaburagi. Saki sees the Ogre and is shocked by its resemblance to Maria. Satoru appears and tells Saki and Niimi that they have to leave as soon as possible, since even Kaburagi cannot kill an Ogre. Though Kaburagi manages to evade the Ogre's first attack, she kills him. Saki and the others run, confronting a Monster Rat along the way who tells ...

episodes.title: Tokyo
episodes.plot: Saki receives a package and a letter from her mother that tells of an ancient weapon used to defeat psychics.

episodes.title: The Face of the Boy
episodes.plot: As Saki's group continue to make their way through the tunnels, they decide to split into two teams to quickly complete their mission.

episodes.title: Torchlight in the Darkness
episodes.plot: With Satoru injured, Kiroumaru suggests that they lure the Ogre into a trap. Saki agrees and they lie in wait, ready to counterattack.

episodes.title: From the New World
episodes.plot: 1000 years after 2011, society has advanced, and most people in the Japan archipelago have psychokinetic powers, know as their Cantus. Join the main character Watanabe Saki as she finds out horrifying truths and recognizing true feelings about Kamisu's 66th District.
